text: Jovino Novoa Vásquez (31 March 1945 - 1 June 2021) was a Chilean politician and lawyer. He was born in Santiago de Chile. From 1998 until 2014, Novoa was a member of the Senate. Between 2009 and 2010, he was the President of the Senate. Novoa died on 1 June 2021 in Santiago from emphysema, aged 76.Murió Jovino Novoa, ex funcionario de la dictadura y líder UDI condenado en el caso Penta ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from emphysema Category:Chilean lawyers Category:Politicians from Santiago
title: Jovino Novoa
